name: Elastic Car Driving Simulator
description:
Car racing games are very enthusiastic simulation games and are playing a large number of people worldwide. Car driving with obstacles are not an easy game. Elastic Car Driving Simulator has a wide range of impossible tracks with obstacles. Drive your spring car and avoid all the obstacles to cross finish line. Be careful while driving if you hit with obstacles your car crash and turn into pieces. Elastic car simulation is a 2D game like off-road challenges. 

Elastic Car Driving Simulator game is based on real physics with interesting animations. There are different hurdles on your way like stones, wooden boxes and ramps to perform stunts.Earn the score on each and every jump and avoid obstacles. Show your driving skills and become a real stunt driver of impossible track. As you clear the racing mission the game becomes harder and harder. There are different upgraded cars to unlock for challenging missions.

Elastic Car Driving Simulator Game Features: 
* Realistic physics used in elastic cars
* 50 challenging missions for car stunts
* Dozens of cars to unlock for impossible tracks
* Soothing sound effects of this 2D game
* Earn bonuses at high speed racing moves

This ultimate racing game has about 50 different driving levels and dozens of cars. Earn bonus points on your every stunt and become a real elastic car champion. 2D racing games are very interesting with off road challenging missions like impossible tracks. Each car has its different characteristics and peculiarities which make your car strengthen.
